content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! I'm an AI, I don't have personal experiences or physical activities like humans do. I exist solely to provide information and assist with inquiries. I don't have a physical body, so I won't be joining a cycling club or participating in any physical activities.

However, I'm always here to help and provide guidance on various topics, including cycling and fitness. I can offer advice, answer questions, and provide resources to help you make informed decisions about your fitness journey.

Feel free to ask me any questions or share your experiences with the cycling club. I'll be happy to help and offer support!
